text: "Girls Like Us" is a song by UK garage group B-15 Project featuring Crissy D and Lady G on vocals. The song was a top-ten hit in the UK, peaking at number seven on the UK Singles Chart. It also reached number one on the UK Dance Chart and number 22 in the Netherlands. Mixmag included "Girls Like Us" in their list of "40 of the best UK garage tracks released from 1995 to 2005". ==Track listing== UK 12" single :A1. "Girls Like Us" (Original Full Length Version) :A2. "Girls Like Us" (Artful Dodger Remix) :B1. "Girls Like Us" (Zed Bias Remix) :B2.
